amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the use of funds to used to support Amtrak's route with the highest loss, measured by passenger per mile cost as based on the National Railroad Passenger Corporation's September 2006 Financial Performance of Routes Report.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 15 printed in the Congressional Record to limit the use of funds to used to support Amtrak's route with the highest loss, measured by passenger per mile cost as based on the National Railroad Passenger Corporation's September 2006 Financial Performance of Routes Report.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 283 (Roll no. 697).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Sessions.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sessions amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 139 - 283 (Roll no. 697).
